scripts.allure:clean: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); ['allure-results', 'allure-report'].forEach(dir => { if (fs.existsSync(dir)) fs.rmSync(dir, { recursive: true, force: true }); });"
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run allure:clean && playwright test
scripts.test:smoke: npm run build && npm run allure:clean && playwright test --grep @smoke && allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
scripts.test:regression: npm run build && npm run allure:clean && playwright test --grep @regression && allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
scripts.test:api: npm run build && npm run allure:clean && playwright test --grep @api && allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
scripts.test:smoke:api: npm run build && npm run allure:clean && playwright test --grep @smoke.*@api && allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
scripts.test:ui: npm run build && npm run allure:clean && playwright test --grep @ui && allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
scripts.test:critical: npm run build && npm run allure:clean && playwright test --grep @critical && allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
scripts.test:negative: npm run build && npm run allure:clean && playwright test --grep @negative && allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
